modShortDescription: This mod aims to rebalance how food, drugs and drinks work on the game, creating purpose for some long forgotten items on the consumables list.
modDescription:
lostReincarnation want to present yourselves the Alaszkaâ€™s Food Rebalance, his first mod made to public.

This mod aims to rebalance how [food](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-food/), drugs and drinks work on the game, creating purpose for some long forgotten items on the consumables list. This is the release of the first module, that adjust recipes. To access the list of all the changes made, there is a changelog.xml file inside the folder.

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1xZI3AVesj58xOi3kmVzc3HHoxo7sNroQ/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23331-mod-alaszkas-consumables-rebalance/).

**Credits:** lostReincarnation
